title: The diameter of a circle is 8 inches. What is the circle's area? - Quora

response.answer_text: The diameter of a circle is 8 inches. What is the circle's area? This is pretty basic. You should learn and remember this formula. The area of a circle = Pi (3.14 is usually close enough) x r^2 (or d/2^2). Use this to figure out the area of your circle, yourself.

People will give you the answer, but you have to learn to solve questions like these on your own. Doing that is actually much less work than not learning, since you’ll never have to write out these questions again.
